long_description: Great for yoga or outdoor fun, the women's Gramicci Tate V-Neck T-Shirt is made from durable hemp that remarkably resists odor and certified organic cotton, both free of pesticides and herbicides. Gramicci Natural Performance Technology fabric is breathable, fast drying and odor resistant, so you stay fresh all day long. Offers UPF 20 sun protection. Gramicci Tate V-Neck T-Shirt features a flattering scoop neck and relaxed, roomy fit through the chest and hips. Front pocket; straight hem. Wash separately in cold water before wearing. Closeout.
short_description: Great for yoga or outdoor fun, the women's Gramicci Tate V-Neck T-Shirt is made from durable hemp that remarkably resists odor and certified organic cotton, both free of pesticides and herbicides.
